name: sallywhitefoundation
overview:
About Three Tweeters collecting the names of earthquake survivors so we can know that our friends in Haiti are safe!@Pepperfire @Alexblom and @highlandwhite combine tweet forces to give the Haitian Community a way to help themselves help each other to rebuild. Mission Having discovered that Google.com and beextra.org have pulled together to create a facial recognition database to compile a list of missing persons, we ask that you add the names of your loved ones who are both missing and accounted for to these lists.

If you need something in Haiti, if you want to know how to get aid to the people. Please contact us.

Along with http://konpay.org/ http://sopudep.org/ http://haitianfire.com/ http://www.peppermaster.com/ http://noulacoop.com/, http://www.pepperfire.ca/ and others we are getting aid to the people, using guerrilla methods.

We are lobbying Government to help make things happen and hope that in putting the right people together with the right people, we will help Haiti find its feet and get back on track to building its future.

Ayiti Solidaire. Company Overview Operation Ayiti is a website group designed to call light, love and hope to the relief efforts required after the earthquake.

It is our belief that by connecting people with each other in this crisis, we will be most helpful.

Read stories of hope and action on our website http://www.operationAyiti.org/ and share with us in helping the aid get to where it is needed most. Description Working with other interested parties in both the Haitian Diaspora and the International Community, Operation Ayiti is finding a way to bring help and hope to Haiti through commercial endeavours and other means.
